Perfection, improved

Dell XPS 13 Developer Edition — the great Ubuntu-based client-to-cloud solution — just got better with Full High Definition display.

Now available in USA, Canada and many countries across Europe

Read all about it

Ubuntu phone and tablet

Ubuntu wins CNET’s best of show award at Mobile World Congress.

Learn more ›

What is Ubuntu?

Ubuntu is the world’s favourite free operating system, with more than 20 million people preferring it to commercial alternatives.

Find out why ›

Fast, free and raring to go.

From the desktop to the cloud, Ubuntu 13.04 is ready to deploy — our fastest and most visually polished release ever

Download it now ›

.row-landscape-trial{padding-bottom:0;border-bottom:0}.uawi{background:#f7f7f7 url(../img/desktop/screenshot-landscape-482x460.png) top right no-repeat;min-height:460px}.desktop-desktop-management .row-hero{background:url(../img/desktop/desktop-management-pictos.png) 88% 20% no-repeat}.server-server-management .row-hero{background:url(../img/server/server-management-pictos.png) 88% 20% no-repeat}.cloud-cloud-management .row-hero{background:url(../img/cloud/cloud-management-pictos.png) 88% 20% no-repeat}body.cloud-cloud-management p.intro,body.desktop-desktop-management p.intro,body.server-server-management p.intro{font-size:1.438em;margin-bottom:.522em;line-height:1.5}.uawi{background:#f7f7f7 url(../img/desktop/screenshot-landscape-482x460.png) top right no-repeat;min-height:460px}body.community .inner-wrapper{padding-bottom:20px}body.community .row .two-col h3,body.community .row-box .two-col h3{font-size:1em;margin-bottom:.75em;line-height:1.3}body.community .row-hero p.intro{font-size:1.219em;margin-bottom:.615em}body.community #main-content .two-col h2{font-size:1.219em;margin-bottom:.615em}body.community .social{text-align:center;background:url(../img/community/small-background-dots.png);padding-top:20px;border-bottom:1px dotted #aea79f;height:162px;margin:-20px}body.community .link-twitter{background:url(../img/community/icon-twitter-bullet.png) no-repeat scroll 0 center transparent}body.community .link-youtube{background:url(../img/community/icon-youtube-bullet.png) no-repeat scroll 0 center transparent}body.community .link-facebook{background:url(../img/community/icon-facebook-bullet.png) no-repeat scroll 0 center transparent}body.community-stay-connected .row-grey{padding-bottom:0}body.community-stay-connected .row-grey img{margin-bottom:-4px}body.community-stay-connected .social-list li{padding:10px 0 10px 25px}body.about .row,body.about .row-box{border-bottom:0}body.about hgroup h1,body.community hgroup h1{float:left;margin-right:10px}body.about hgroup h2,body.community hgroup h2{font-size:2.25em;margin-bottom:.333em;color:#aea79f}body.about .equal-height .box,body.support .equal-height .box{background:#f7f7f7;border:0}body.about .equal-height .box h2{font-size:1em;margin-bottom:.75em;font-weight:normal}body.partners .row:last-child{border-bottom:0}body.partners .four-col h2{font-size:1.438em;margin-bottom:.522em}body.partners-arm .row div{-moz-column-count:2;-moz-column-gap:20px;-webkit-column-count:2;-webkit-column-gap:20px;column-count:2;column-gap:20px}body.partners-home .row{border-bottom:0}body.partners .row-hero div{-moz-column-count:inherit;-webkit-column-count:1;column-count:1;-moz-column-gap:0;-webkit-column-gap:0;column-gap:0}body.partners-dell #dell-quotes{border-top:1px dotted #aea79f;padding-top:20px}body.partners-dell #dell-quotes p{font-size:1em;margin-bottom:.75em}body.partners-dell #servers img{margin-bottom:20px}body.partners-dell-dellxps .row-hero{background:url(../img/homepage/dell_sputnik.png) 94% 50px no-repeat}body.partners-dell-dellxps #dell-buy-now{float:left}body.partners-dell-dellxps #dell-buy-now a{display:block}body.partners-certified-software .row-hero .link-cta-ubuntu,body.partners-find-a-partner .row-hero .link-cta-ubuntu{margin-top:20px}body.partners-certified-software .box,body.partners-find-a-partner .box{min-height:450px}body.partners-certified-software .box img,body.partners-find-a-partner .box img{max-height:50px;margin-bottom:10px}body.partners-certified-software .box h3,body.partners-find-a-partner .box h3{color:#aea79f;font-size:15px;margin-bottom:20px}body.partners-certified-software ul,body.partners-find-a-partner ul{margin-bottom:10px}#insights-feed ul{display:table}#insights-feed ul li{display:table-cell;line-height:1.4;float:none;padding-left:20px}#insights-feed ul li a{display:block;margin-bottom:6px}#insights-feed ul li span{text-transform:uppercase}#insights-feed ul li span.date{text-transform:none}#insights-feed ul li:first-child{padding-left:0}#insights-feed ul li:last-child{margin-right:0}.yui3-js-enabled .row-enterprise-blog{display:none}body.error404 #main-content .hero-box{padding-bottom:0}body.error404 #main-content .hero-box div{margin-bottom:-25px}body.error404 #main-content .hero-box img{margin-top:-50px}body.error404 #main-content .hero-box span{position:absolute;top:16px;right:46px;color:#fff;font-size:36px}body.error404 #main-content .hero-box p{font-size:21px}body.error404 #main-content .hero-box .last-col{padding-top:70px}body.error404 #main-content h2{font-size:21px}body.error404 #main-content .events a{float:right}

Perfection, improved

Dell XPS 13 Developer Edition — the great Ubuntu-based client-to-cloud solution — just got better with Full High Definition display.

Now available in USA, Canada and many countries across Europe

Read all about it

Ubuntu phone and tablet

Ubuntu wins CNET’s best of show award at Mobile World Congress.

Learn more ›

What is Ubuntu?

Ubuntu is the world’s favourite free operating system, with more than 20 million people preferring it to commercial alternatives.

Find out why ›

Fast, free and raring to go.

From the desktop to the cloud, Ubuntu 13.04 is ready to deploy — our fastest and most visually polished release ever

Download it now ›
